tossup_question: -  11)  – 	Which of the following correctly describes chromatin?
tossup_MCQoptions:
W) Condensed DNA and associated proteins
X) Just condensed DNA
Y) DNA and associated carbohydrates
Z) Loosely coiled DNA and associated proteins
tossup_answer: ANSWER: W) CONDENSED DNA AND ASSOCIATED PROTEINS
bonus_question: -   –  Thomas Hunt Morgan did his inheritance experimentation on red-eyed and white-eyed mutants of which organism?
